abstract: The Trump administration may find itself facing the very dilemma the nuclear deal was designed to avoid.
lead_paragraph: The costs of the United States’ targeted killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani, the commander of the Quds Force of Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps, are mounting beyond the already significant risks of Iranian retaliation and subsequent military confrontation.
keywords: ARMS CONTROL AND LIMITATION AND DISARMAMENT
